ygData.subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson holds Talon s hand gently.  Inside he could feel his heart thumping a mile a minute.  There was no denying it, this feeling was genuine, and of all bots

Tucson holds Talon's hand gently.  Inside he could feel his heart thumping =
a mile a minute.  There was no denying it, this feeling was genuine, and of=
 all bots he never thought he too would feel this way about a femme. But th=
ere it was, the utmost of sincerity, compassion and love.  He couldn't quit=
e tell Lord Elder, Kup or Elita that love was his first objective, because =
he didn't know if they'd understand. Even a Prime has to fib a little at so=
me point, just as long as it was harmless.  In this case, it truely was.  H=
e couldn't deny it, Like Rodimus, who had fallen in love with Nightlight, h=
e was definitely in love with Talon.

" I'd never forget about you Talon.  =
As a matter of fact, you were the main reason why I came here.  I - had to =
tell Lord Elder a slight fib because if he ever knew the real reason why I =
left, I - don't know if he'd really understand it..  I was thinking about y=
ou all the time I was away."

Rat Trap looks back, keeping his tiny fingers=
 crossed for something wonderful to transpire.  He looks to Depthcharge and=
 the others.

" I hope, I hope, I hope...  It's a match made on Cybertron y=
a know. I think Wheels is a little bit of a shy guy, and ya know if this wo=
rks, I think he'll come outa that tiny shell of his."

Tucson gently takes =
Talon's other hand and gently gives her a kiss on her cheek.  After realizi=
ng his actions, that slight shade of red returns around his faceplate.

" O=
h, wow, where did - that come from? I - hope I didn't offend you in any way=
."

Rat Trap catches his kiss out of the corner of his eye and soon a grin =
grows from one corner of his face to the other.

" Way ta go Wheels."  

Tu=
cson couldn't help but rest an arm over Talon's shoulder.  He wanted very m=
uch to seal a relationship yet he didn't want to appear too forward at the =
same time.  Yet, at this moment, even through the darkest of times, a sheer=
 happiness floods his emotions for the first time in ages. A happiness that=
 can't just be bought with power and strength alone.  

" I suppose I bette=
r tell Lord Elder the Truth shouldn't I?  But I'd like very much for you to=
 come with me Talon. After all, My promise to you is never leave your side,=
 unless of course the spark in my body is extinguished through extreme mean=
s.  Other than that, nothing and no one will tear us apart."

He looks into=
 her eyes with the utmost of sincerity.

"If anything were to happen to me,=
 the power that the Matrix has given me, I hope to pass it to you, it's my =
wish, and my promise. Now, let's get the pieces we need to put this matter =
of Unicron and everything else, to rest."

airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Talon:
> 
> "Tucson... Its beautiful... I dont kn=
ow what to say"Talon smiled while she took the compass and she said "I've t=
ought that you have forgotten me, but i was mistaken... I'm very happy to s=
ee you again"
> 
> Talon Blushed, she felt overhelmed with happpines, after=
 her heart was broken twice, she never tought that she was able to feel lik=
e right in that instant but at the same time a part of her was feared to su=
ffer again
>

ome back

> 
>   
> Tucson looks to Talon and gathers all his courage at =
this point to finally speak up and start the conversation.
> 
> " When I co=
uldn't see anything, you a great help in that first battle we fought togeth=
er.. I - don't think anyone else would have risked their life like you had,=
 for me. A piece of " Old Junk" as Nightstrike put it.. After that, you stu=
ck by me when you didn't have to. That meant quite a bit to me Talon. It st=
ill does. And now, in more ways than one.. I - meant what I said, you're mo=
re beautiful than I ever imagined before I could see what you looked like. =
And not only are you beautiful on the outside, you're also beautiful on the=
 inside."
> 
> He gently takes her hand.
> 
> " I'm sure you've heard this =
from a lot of other bots but I mean every word honestly. And I'd be honored=
 if you could continue to be beside me not only in battle, but companionshi=
p." 
> 
> He remembered an artifact, a tiny artifact that he had found on A=
tlantis. A compass, which he was able to restore simply by feel alone. The =
compass also held a tiny pearl inside, as part of its decoration. He takes =
it out of his subspaced gauntlet, and presents it to Talon.
> 
> " Now I kn=
ow why I held onto this for so long. Before I left Atlantis, I was working =
on restoring this artifact. It's nothing large, but, I know it's valuable. =
I'd like you to have this."
> 
> The pearl sparkles as lights touch it.
> 
=
